name: cult
content:
cult noun
(RELIGION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a religious group, often living together, whose beliefs are considered extreme or strange by many people: Their son ran away from home and joined a religious cult.
[ C ] a particular system of religious belief: the Hindu cult of Shiva
